price: Anaasε Ɔbɛtumi ama wͻn so ate anaa wͻn asa nkakrankakra? Nokorε sε, wo Wura Nyankopͻn ne Ayεmyε Hene, na Ɔno ara nso ne Mmͻborͻhunufoͻ Hene.
arabic: أَوۡ يَأۡخُذَهُمۡ عَلَىٰ تَخَوُّفٖ فَإِنَّ رَبَّكُمۡ لَرَءُوفٞ رَّحِيمٌ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: aw yakhudhahum ʿalā takhawwufin fa-inna rabbakum laraūfun raḥīmun
